# React Photo Gallery with Lorem Picsum API

This is a React TypeScript application that displays a photo gallery using the Lorem Picsum API with the following features:

## Key Features
- Responsive grid layout of photos
- Infinite scroll to load more photos
- Detailed photo view on click
- React Router for navigation
- Tailwind CSS for styling

## Project Structure
- Photo list component with infinite scroll
- Photo detail component for individual photos
- API service for Lorem Picsum integration
- Responsive design for desktop and mobile

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow React functional component patterns with hooks
- Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling
- Handle loading states and errors gracefully
- Implement proper error boundaries
